node.title: Personably now integrates with Peakon
node.html:
Another month, another integration (or three).

At Personably we get to hear a lot about the tools that teams like to use and what we can integrate with to make their lives easier when bringing someone new into the company.

One of the tools we've been hearing about a lot is Peakon! Peakon lets you measure employee engagement but in a way that gives you insights you can actually use to drive change. In their words they're "a data company - not a survey company".

By connecting Personably to Peakon you can add your new employees into Peakon as part of their onboarding with just one click. We take the name, email, start-date and team from the information you've already given us and create a new employee in Peakon for you.

Here's our guide on how to set up the integration.
